challenge.title: Step 5
challenge.description: Add another key-value pair to the dictionary you are appending to the expense list. Use the string 'category' as the key, and the category parameter as the value.

tests.text: You should add a second key-value pair to the dictionary you are passing as the argument to the .append() method.
tests.testString:
({ test: () => assert(runPython(`
import ast
node = _Node(_code).find_function("add_expense").find_calls("append")[0].find_call_args()
len(node) == 1 and isinstance(node[0].tree, ast.Dict) and len(node[0].tree.keys) == 2
`)) })

tests.text: You should pass {'amount': amount, 'category': category} as the argument to the .append() method.

challengeFiles.name: main
main
